title: Winter Clothes Donation Drive - Dhaka
description: Join us in our mission to provide warm winter clothes to the underprivileged people in Dhaka. Your donations will help children and adults stay warm this winter.
contactInfo: Call us at +880123456789 or email us at donate@winterdrive.com

title: Winter Clothes Donation - Chittagong
description: We are collecting winter clothes for the people of Chittagong who are in dire need. Help us make a difference in their lives by contributing any winter clothing you can spare.

title: Winter Clothes Drive for Sylhet
description: Winter can be extremely harsh for those without proper clothing. Donate your old winter clothes to our Sylhet campaign and help those in need.
contactInfo: Reach out at +8801122334455 or email us at sylhet@winterdonate.com

title: Barisal Winter Clothes Collection
description: This winter, help provide warmth to the people of Barisal. We are collecting jackets, sweaters, gloves, and more to distribute to those in need.
contactInfo: For more info, call +8803344556677 or email us at barisal@donatewarmth.com

title: Khulna Winter Clothing Campaign
description: Khulna's winter can be harsh for many families. Donate your winter clothes and support our mission to make this season warmer for those who need it the most.
contactInfo: Call us at +8807788990011 or email khulna@warmdonate.com

title: Rangpur Winter Clothes Donation
description: Help the people of Rangpur stay warm this winter by donating any unused winter clothes. Your kindness can make a big difference.
contactInfo: For inquiries, contact +8801122336677 or email us at rangpur@wintercare.com
